name: df-cplgr
body: |- wceq(ccplgr, cab(s0, wceq(cfv(cuvtx, cv(s0)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the class of all complete "graphs". A class/graph is called _complete_ if every pair of distinct vertices is connected by an edge, i.e., each vertex has all other vertices as neighbors or, in other words, each vertex is a universal vertex. (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2020.) (Revised by TA, 15-Feb-2022.)
